headline: Truist Open Banking Move With Mastercard And What It Means For Valuation
summary: Truist Financial (NYSE:TFC) has launched its first open banking integration through Mastercard's open finance platform. The partnership provides Truist clients with secure, centralized access to their financial data via direct API connections. The launch enables Truist customers to connect their accounts to participating fintech apps while keeping data access controlled and transparent. For you as an investor, this move places Truist within ongoing changes in digital banking and data...
